Title: Hiros
Plot: Matt uses his abilities to help his marriage. Niki, distraught over another blackout, arrives home to learn that her husband, D.L., has escaped from prison. Claire tells her father about some of the things she's been through lately. Down and out in Vegas, Hiro finally connects with another hero. Peter must figure out what to do with the mysterious message.
GuestStars: Archie Kao, Adam Harrington, Liza Lapira, Michael Reilly Burke, Mike Foy, Archie Kao, Nicole Bilderback, Eugene Byrd
